aws_codebuild_source_credential.description: Provides a CodeBuild Source Credential resource.

auth_type.description: The type of authentication used to connect to a GitHub, GitHub Enterprise, or Bitbucket repository. An OAUTH connection is not supported by the API.

server_type.description: The source provider used for this project.

token.description: For `GitHub` or `GitHub Enterprise`, this is the personal access token. For `Bitbucket`, this is the app password.

user_name.description: The Bitbucket username when the authType is `BASIC_AUTH`. This parameter is not valid for other types of source providers or connections.
